title: Patch Notes
content: a follower or summon used the Scrying Eyes in the Iron Throne. Fixed a blocker when you tried to use any item while your character was Knocked Down. Fixed the game freezing when dragging items while trading or bartering. Fixed a multiplayer issue where the host would get a black screen for 15 seconds when transitioning to a crime dialogue. Fixed an Honour Mode issue at High Hall where all party members would die when reaching the top of the stem if anyone in the party was being dominated by an e
